chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type
T0: Type
f: T -> T0
s: SF_seq

Goal:
SF_size (SF_map f s) = SF_size s

Premises:
SF_map = fun (f : T -> T0) (s : SF_seq) => {| SF_h := SF_h s; SF_t := [seq (fst x, f (snd x)) | x <- SF_t s] |} : (T -> T0) -> SF_seq -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
SF_size = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => size (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> nat Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
SF_size_rev : forall s0 : SF_seq, SF_size (SF_rev s0) = SF_size s0 where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_map_lx : forall (f : T -> T0) (s : SF_seq), SF_lx (SF_map f s) = SF_lx s
SF_map_rev : forall (f : T -> T0) (s : SF_seq), SF_rev (SF_map f s) = SF_map f (SF_rev s)
SF_size_ly : forall s0 : SF_seq, size (SF_ly s0) = SF_size s0 where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_map_rcons : forall (f : T -> T0) (s : SF_seq) (h : R * T), SF_map f (SF_rcons s h) = SF_rcons (SF_map f s) (fst h, f (snd h))
SF_map_cons : forall (f : T -> T0) (h : R * T) (s : SF_seq), SF_map f (SF_cons h s) = SF_cons (fst h, f (snd h)) (SF_map f s)
SF_size_rcons : forall (s0 : SF_seq) (t : R * ?T), SF_size (SF_rcons s0 t) = S (SF_size s0) where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_size_cons : forall (h : R * ?T) (s0 : SF_seq), SF_size (SF_cons h s0) = S (SF_size s0) where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_map_ly : forall (f : T -> T0) (s : SF_seq), SF_ly (SF_map f s) = [seq f i | i <- SF_ly s]
SF_map_sort : forall (f : T -> T0) (s : SF_seq) (Ord : R -> R -> Prop), SF_sorted Ord s -> SF_sorted Ord (SF_map f s)
zip_unzip : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq (S * T)), zip (unzip1 s) (unzip2 s) = s
revK = fun (T : Type) (_top_assumption_ : seq T) => (fun (_evar_0_ : (fun l : seq T => rev (rev l) = l) [::]) (_evar_0_0 : forall (a : T) (l : seq T), (fun l0 : seq T => rev (rev l0) = l0) l -> (fun l0 : seq T => rev (rev l0) = l0) (a :: l)) => list_ind (fun l : seq T => rev (rev l) = l) _evar_0_ _evar_0_0 _top_assumption_) eq_refl (fun (x : T) (s : seq T) (IHs : rev (rev s) = s) => (fun _evar_0_ : rev (rcons (rev s) x) = x :: s => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : seq T => rev _pattern_value_ = x :: s) _evar_0_ (rev_cons x s)) ((fun _evar_0_ : x ::...
SF_lx = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => SF_h s :: unzip1 (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> seq R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
SF_lx_ly_inj : forall s0 s1 : SF_seq, SF_lx s0 = SF_lx s1 -> SF_ly s0 = SF_ly s1 -> s0 = s1 where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type]
size_scanl : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (g : T1 -> T2 -> T1) (x : T1) (s : seq T2), size (scanl g x s) = size s
SF_ly_surj : forall s0 s1 : SF_seq, s0 = s1 -> SF_ly s0 = SF_ly s1 where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_rev_surj : forall s0 s1 : SF_seq, s0 = s1 -> SF_rev s0 = SF_rev s1 where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_lx_surj : forall s0 s1 : SF_seq, s0 = s1 -> SF_lx s0 = SF_lx s1 where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_rev_inj : forall s0 s1 : SF_seq, SF_rev s0 = SF_rev s1 -> s0 = s1 where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_behead = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => {| SF_h := head (SF_h s) (unzip1 (SF_t s)); SF_t := behead (SF_t s) |} : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
SF_sorted = fun (T : Type) (Ord : R -> R -> Prop) (s : SF_seq) => sorted Ord (SF_lx s) : forall T : Type, (R -> R -> Prop) -> SF_seq -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _]
SF_ly = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => unzip2 (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
SF_last = fun (T : Type) (y0 : T) (s : SF_seq) => last (SF_h s, y0) (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, T -> SF_seq -> R * T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
size_rev : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T), size (rev s) = size s
last_unzip1 : forall (x0 : ?S) (y0 : ?T) (s0 : seq (?S * ?T)), last x0 (unzip1 s0) = fst (last (x0, y0) s0) where ?S : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type] ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_rev_invol : forall s0 : SF_seq, SF_rev (SF_rev s0) = s0 where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_lx_nil : forall x0 : R, SF_lx (SF_nil x0) = [:: x0] where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type]
seq_ind2 : forall P : seq ?S -> seq ?T -> Type, P [::] [::] -> (forall (x : ?S) (y : ?T) (s0 : seq ?S) (t : seq ?T), size s0 = size t -> P s0 t -> P (x :: s0) (y :: t)) -> forall (s0 : seq ?S) (t : seq ?T), size s0 = size t -> P s0 t where ?S : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type] ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_make : forall (lx : seq R) (ly : seq ?T), size lx = S (size ly) -> SF_seq where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_ly_rev : forall s0 : SF_seq, SF_ly (SF_rev s0) = rev (SF_ly s0) where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_lx_rev : forall s0 : SF_seq, SF_lx (SF_rev s0) = rev (SF_lx s0) where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_size_lx : forall s0 : SF_seq, size (SF_lx s0) = S (SF_size s0) where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_size_lx_ly : forall s0 : SF_seq, size (SF_lx s0) = S (size (SF_ly s0)) where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type]
f_equal_nat : forall (B : Type) (f : nat -> B) (x y : nat), x = y -> f x = f y
Nat.eqf = fun f g : nat -> bool => forall n : nat, f n = g n : (nat -> bool) -> (nat -> bool) -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope]
SF_seq_bij : forall s0 : SF_seq, SF_make (SF_lx s0) (SF_ly s0) (SF_size_lx_ly s0) = s0 where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_rev_0 : forall s0 : SF_seq, size (rev (SF_lx s0)) = S (size (rev (SF_ly s0))) where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 s : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_rev = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => SF_make (rev (SF_lx s)) (rev (SF_ly s)) (SF_rev_0 s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
size_rcons : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T) (x : T), size (rcons s x) = S (size s)
SF_rcons = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) (t : R * T) => {| SF_h := SF_h s; SF_t := rcons (SF_t s) t |} : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> R * T -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]

```coq
unfold SF_map, SF_size.
destruct s as [h t].
simpl. rewrite map_size. reflexivity.
Qed.```
